page.title: 09BANKS IN ABERDOUR AREA
page.content: In our area there are three{Royal {Banks of Scotland.}One of the banks is in a shopping centre on the edge of our area,another on{Hillend Industrial {estate}and the final bank in{Aberdour {High Street.}The banks have an annual turnover running into millions of pounds.The{Dalgety Bay}bank is going to merge with the{Industrial estate one on the 1st.of{October,1985.}The banks in our area employ{4}people at {Dalgety Bay,8}at{Hillend Industrial estate and{6}at{Aberdour.}One manager takes care of all three banks.At the moment depositers with over{Â£1000}get a gross interest rate of{9.5%. Borrowers are charged{13%}net rate.There are also{2}building society agents in{Aberdour.}One is for the {Halifax}and the other for the{Abbey {National Building Society.
